Class Threat

java.lang.Object
us.springett.threatmodeling.model.Threat
public class Threat extends Object
A theoretical event with the potential to adversely impact an asset through unauthorized access, destruction, disclosure, modification of data, and/or denial of service.
Since:
1.0.0
